drupalNodeEvent.title: Global Hong Kong Speaker Series: Protest, repression and justice in Northern Ireland

field_organizers.processed: Global China Center HKUST , Society for Hong Kong Studies

field_description.processed: Human rights lawyer Kevin Boyle was a leader of the civil rights movement in Northern Ireland. Former CNN correspondent Mike Chinoy discusses his new book, Are You With Me? Kevin Boyle and the Rise of the Human Rights Movement, and the lessons of Boyleâ€™s life and work for protection of human rights around the world today.
